con:setting.id: HTTP tunnel - Set SSL Client Key Store path
HTTP tunnel - Set SSL Client Key Store Password

con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.cba.am/" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:tns="http://www.cba.am/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tm="http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:types> <s:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.cba.am/"> <s:import namespace="http://tempuri.org/ExchangeRatesDS.xsd"/> <s:import schemaLocation="http://api.cba.am/exchangerates.asmx?schema=ExchangeRatesDS" namespace="http://tempuri.org/ExchangeRatesDS.xsd"/> <s:element name="ISOCodesDetailed"> <s:complexType/> </s:element> <s:element name="ISOCodesDetailedResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ISOCodesDetailedResult"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:any minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" processContents="lax"/> <s:any minOccurs="1" namespace="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-diffgram-v1" processContents="lax"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute fixed="http://tempuri.org/ExchangeRatesDS.xsd" name="namespace"/> <s:attribute fixed="ISOCodesDataTable" name="tableTypeName"/> </s:complexType> </s:element> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ISOCodes"> <s:complexType/> </s:element> <s:element name="ISOCodesResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ISOCodesResult" type="tns:ArrayOfString"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfString"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="string" nillable="true" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISO"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ISO" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISOResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISOResult" type="tns:ExchangeRates"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ExchangeRates"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="CurrentDate" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="NextAvailableDate" nillable="true" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="PreviousAvailableDate" nillable="true" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Rates" type="tns:ArrayOfExchangeRate"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfExchangeRate"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" name="ExchangeRate" nillable="true" type="tns:ExchangeRate"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ExchangeRate"> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ISO" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Amount" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Rate" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="Difference" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISO"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="date" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ISO" type="s:string"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISOResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISOResult" type="tns:ExchangeRates"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesByDate"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="date" type="s:dateTime"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesByDateResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ExchangeRatesByDateResult" type="tns:ExchangeRates"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesLatest"> <s:complexType/> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesLatestResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ExchangeRatesLatestResult" type="tns:ExchangeRates"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISO"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ISOCodes" type="s:string"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="DateFrom" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" name="DateTo" type="s:dateTime"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISOResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISOResult"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:any minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" processContents="lax"/> <s:any minOccurs="1" namespace="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-diffgram-v1" processContents="lax"/> </s:sequence> <s:attribute fixed="http://tempuri.org/ExchangeRatesDS.xsd" name="namespace"/> <s:attribute fixed="ExchangeRatesByRangeDataTable" name="tableTypeName"/> </s:complexType> </s:element> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> </s:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="ISOCodesDetailedSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ISOCodesDetailed"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ISOCodesDetailedSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ISOCodesDetailedResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ISOCodesSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ISOCodes"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ISOCodesSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ISOCodesResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISOSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesLatestByISO"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISOSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesLatestByISOResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISOSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateByISO"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISOSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateByISOResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesByDateSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesByDate"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesByDateSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesLatestSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesLatest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesLatestSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesLatestResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISOSoapIn"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISO"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISOSoapOut"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISOResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="GateSoap"> <wsdl:operation name="ISOCodesDetailed"> <wsdl:documentation>Detailed list of codes.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ISOCodesDetailedSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ISOCodesDetailedSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ISOCodes"> <wsdl:documentation>List of the latest available ISO codes. Based on latest published rates.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ISOCodesSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ISOCodesSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISO"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves latest rates of the specified ISO, will return single line. Includes trend. Check ISO Codes method for all available codes.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ExchangeRatesLatestByISOSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ExchangeRatesLatestByISOSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISO"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves latest rates of the specified date and ISO, will return single line. Includes trend. Check ISO Codes method for all available codes.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateByISOSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateByISOSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDate"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves all available rates of the specified date. Includes trend.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesLatest"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves the lastest published rates. Includes trend. Recommended for Web sites integration.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ExchangeRatesLatestSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ExchangeRatesLatestSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISO"> <wsdl:documentation>Retrieves rates for the specified period for comma separated ISO codes list.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISOSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISOSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="GateSoap" type="tns:GateSoap"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="ISOCodesDetailed"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ISOCodesDetailed" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ISOCodes"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ISOCodes" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISO"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesLatestByISO" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISO"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesByDateByISO" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDate"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesByDate" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesLatest"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesLatest" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISO"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISO" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:binding name="GateSoap12" type="tns:GateSoap"> <soap12:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="ISOCodesDetailed"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ISOCodesDetailed" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ISOCodes"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ISOCodes" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesLatestByISO"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesLatestByISO" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDateByISO"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesByDateByISO" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDate"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesByDate" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesLatest"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesLatest" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISO"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://www.cba.am/ExchangeRatesByDateRangeByISO" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="Gate"> <wsdl:port name="GateSoap" binding="tns:GateSoap"> <soap:address location="http://api.cba.am/exchangerates.asmx"/> </wsdl:port> <wsdl:port name="GateSoap12" binding="tns:GateSoap12"> <soap12:address location="http://api.cba.am/exchangerates.asmx"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="qualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://tempuri.org/ExchangeRatesDS.xsd" id="ExchangeRatesDS" xmlns:mstns="http://tempuri.org/ExchangeRatesDS.xsd" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata" xmlns="http://tempuri.org/ExchangeRatesDS.xsd" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true" name="ExchangeRatesDS"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="ExchangeRates"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Rate" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Amount" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ISO"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element msdata:ReadOnly="true" minOccurs="0" name="Diff" type="xs:decimal"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ISOCodes"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ISO"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="DescriptionAM"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="DescriptionEN"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Amount" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ExchangeRatesByRange"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Rate" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="Amount" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="ISO"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="3"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element msdata:ReadOnly="true" minOccurs="0" name="Diff" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="RateDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> <xs:unique msdata:PrimaryKey="true" name="Constraint1"> <xs:selector xpath=".//mstns:ISOCodes"/> <xs:field xpath="mstns:ISO"/> </xs:unique> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

con:config.script:
import jxl.* import jxl.write.*
import java.util.Random
Random random = new Random() Workbook workbook1= Workbook.getWorkbook(new File("C:/Users/Training05/Downloads/SoapUI-5.4.0/bin/isocode.xls")) Sheet sheet1=workbook1.getSheet(0) def count=(sheet1.getRows())-1 String scount=Integer.toString(count) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["Properties"].setPropertyValue("ISOCodes Count",scount) log.info(scount)
def start=2 def end=count def randvalue = random.nextInt(end + 1 - start) + start log.info(randvalue) Cell iso=sheet1.getCell(0,randvalue) testRunner.testCase.testSteps["Properties"].setPropertyValue("ExRateLatestByISO",iso.getContents());
